ValidationRule.description: Return Opportunities cannot be moved back in stage by sales people, if the opportunity stage is greater than Return Initiated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (RecordTypeId = "0121a000000ARoK"), ISCHANGED(StageName), (PRIORVALUE(Probability) > 0.25), NOT( OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ($Permission.Finance_Contractor), (CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance")), ($Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin"), (CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot moved stages to a prior stage. Please contact Salesops or Finance.
